storyInfo: Despite the then Minister of Finance Witte's unexpected visit, Kal'tsit cannot let this precious opportunity slip by. After injecting the Grand Duke with her drug, Kal'tsit accompanies the wrongdoer through his final moments.

attributes.content: 17 Years Ago
2:44 P.M. \ Clear
Central Ursus, Pine Valley Retreat exterior
Hfff—huff—
Hfff—
Huff—
Hff.
Ah, old friend, are you feeling better now?
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: No, no, you lie down, I'm just here to see you, I'll be leaving soon after. A burdenbeast's work is never done, and the one who saddled me was myself, to boot.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: What? No, of course. To you, I'm still the same young lad you know, not the Minister of Finance.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: What's the point in fiddling with ranks? We're all here giving our strength to Ursus's vast land, striving for the truly honorable future Our Majesty envisions.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: We're all His Majesty's people. The few who've forgotten it, still living in the violent past, will sooner or later become orphans of archaic convention.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Sorry, it seems government business has built up some steam in me.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Don't worry, I can see how my colleagues and fellow strivers are strong in spirit, and I can see how the rot in the rotten eats away at themselves. We will be victorious.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Those loudmouth nobles in the Army... they and those woodworms will very soon be dust at His Majesty's feet, and we will sweep them out of His way.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: —The State Council is changing.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: We'll take everything Ursus, everything of His Majesty's back from those unthinking, undoing aristocrats' hands.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: We'll tear the olden days to shreds. Savage them. Profane them. We must open a new way for Ursus, old friend—I will do it. We all will do it. Even if it takes our whole lives.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Ursus needs change.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Today?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The original plan was next week... but today's the best chance.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: I just heard the head caretaker say. The Minister of Finance's arrival is clearly intended to rattle that spineless coward. Though the Minister was unwilling to meet him, he was at least willing to move himself.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: He's frightened. And fear will make him show openings.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: His guards might not have been able to arrange for this sudden meeting in time, but he had no choice except show himself before us, as hastily as possible...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: With another Ursus VIP visiting, opting to assassinate the Grand Duke is an extremely risky idea, but this place has never been empty of major players, and I can count the number of times the Grand Duke left his area alone on one hand.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: We're still not certain enough.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm still not certain enough.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: But I trust you are.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: I've wanted to believe, even, that you could always do it.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Tell me, do you still have any misgivings?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: I'll settle them for you, even if I—
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Lillia.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: My greatest misgiving... is whether you'll live well, as I hope for you to.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No matter how you'll regard what I say next, I still must recognize: in Chernobog, all those youngest, richly idealistic, most ardent scientists... all gave their lives.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I am not willing to see them die. Lillia, I regard you in the same way right now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I can't do that, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: After this is over, I'll make for Siracusa, then on to Victoria.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If you come with me... and don't continue with your plans in Chernobog, then you don't have to die.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I can't bear traitors stamping footprints on my husband's dried blood, not for even one second.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: You're very selfish.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I am. So don't you forget my most selfish request of all...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Look after my daughter, and if she's willing, teach her medicine.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: You can surely live on, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Old friend.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Winter this year is very cold, but I trust spring will be warm as it ever was.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: I still remember the day we first met was at the beginning of spring. Attending that speech so brimming with passion, you didn't cheer, nor did you bellow.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: We noticed each other when our eyes met, and of course others too.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: No one felt any pride in the successful invasion, those cheering and revering the former Emperor's glory, unable to even see the barren land they stood on, having allowed no one else to survive.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.text: Witte, is spring coming?

attributes.content: I do not know, old friend. Perhaps.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Spring this year may come slightly early, but my Catastrophe Messenger tells me, following a fierce Catastrophe up north, it may be cooler after some days.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Perhaps we may even return to winter.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.text: None of us like winter, do we?

attributes.content: I don't like it either, old mate.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: But you did warn me, perhaps I should give up the bottle... I shouldn't be weathering winter with drink. All it does is numb. Drunkenness might get me frostbitten.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: But winter won't last too long.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Just the fallout of a calamity.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: An eternal rest. The most secure method, completely effective, and not so fast-acting it gives us nowhere to run.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Have you fully prepared our retreat?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: From the first day we arrived, I'd already finished preparing everything.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Perhaps we won't have much time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I understand that, but if we just do it like we practiced, we should have plenty of...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We've taken this sanatorium as far too simple a place.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your plan doesn't need to change. Leave everything afterwards for me to handle.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What did you find out?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Mon3tr discovered traces of the enemy while hibernating. Have you heard of the Grand Duke having dealings with other powers of Ursus, or not?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No, he's been content here all this time.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Mon3tr... is that that pet of yours? What did it see? Some Ursus folk legend?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: I cannot realistically tell you the facts. That would only shrink our chances of survival to the minimum.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mm... Ursus has many, many means...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Fear becomes a lure. Investigating this will only serve to affect your judgment. Trust me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Alright. It's about time now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: See the blonde Feline carrying a bag—he's the Grand Duke's private doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: What can a Grand Duke accomplish?
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Look at these fellows stuck in their old ways... Of course, the moment that half-blinded governor knelt in front of His Majesty, he ceased to be any more of a threat.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: He's very smart, choosing when it suited to save his own skin. Nothing like some people... putting up last stands for their own selfish gains, even squandering what little live power Ursus had left to deal with the aftermath of the rebellions.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: It grieves me so... Though I'm no military leader, whenever I see our motherland's production at a standstill, the economy in decline, I lament deep and deeper.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.text: Did His Majesty pardon these opportunists? They'd put their own interest above His Majesty's and Ursus's with just one inch of slack, in one heartbeat.

attributes.content: Don't condemn His Majesty's benevolence. Compared to putting up with a few shrewd but provisionally loyal nobles, what we truly cannot bear is continuing our endless internal friction.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: We must think of ways to pull out the weeds and pests. We must sow the seeds. We must, when spring comes again, see the new buds.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: For this I've strived... please pardon my language; I very rarely say such things, but I swear upon His Majesty, I do feel pride in my own present status.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Old friend, be reassured. Those sacrificed cannot complete their undertaking. All those who survived will keep trying, and trying.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: His Majesty will bring a new future to Ursus. Even the most stubborn nobles, and those twisted deities, and those monsters planted in the darkest corners of our motherland, they all must fear—they all must fear our Emperor.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: My duty is simply to ensure this.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Halt.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Did the head caretaker not tell you? Grand Duke Vanya has requisitioned this place, and no one is to come near.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: I'm the doctor on shift today. I'm the Grand Duke's medical consultant, by all rights. This is my work permit.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: You're new here?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Grand Duke Vanya's doctor on duty is his private doctor. It's an unwritten rule. Lucky you, you pretty much get a vacation today.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Seeing as it's your first time, I won't blame you. But wander around this corridor again, and your death will not be pretty.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Now, get out. Find somewhere to spend your vacation while you have it.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: It's me. Not much. The doctor on shift at the retreat. I'll get them out of here...
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: What...? The quack's vanished?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: But it'd be dangerous to... erm... the Minister of Finance is here, I know...
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: You two, halt.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Yes, we're listening to you.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Can I ask if something's the matter?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Come with me.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Listen. No matter what you find, it's because of the Grand Duke's same old problems. Don't make a fuss over nothing.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Be dependable. Take care of him properly. Get out quickly after the sun's down, and don't disturb his peace.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Treat him properly, and you'll be rewarded. Amply. Enough for... poor people like you to live happily for a long time.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Thank you kindly. We're honored to have this chance... Kal'tsit, where's your thanks?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Ah... right. Thank you kindly, good sir.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmph, country people. Don't mess this up.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: We'll pay full attention.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Hold it.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: It's always been one person going in alone. We can't make an exception this time, or the Grand Duke will turn his rage on us.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Let this servant go in.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: —But, sir, I'm the doctor here—
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: We prepare the medicine the Grand Duke takes. You just stay here and wait, and if anything happens, go in then.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: I don't understand—
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: I am saying to wait here for three hours, on standby.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: And then, you. You cannot be in there for more than ten minutes.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: If you take too long, no matter why, you will not leave alive.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Search, and then let this servant go in first.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: As you command.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Grand Duke.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: With his back to the light sits an old man—lies an old man. He does not move, his breathing tranquil, gazing into the far distance.

attributes.content: Is it the doctor?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: No, I am only a servant.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Alright... come, come closer.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: As you command.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Are you Ursus?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Lower your head. Let me feel your face.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: As you command.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah... Vulpo, or maybe Feline? An adorable race.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Are... Are your eyes unsighted?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes. A problem from last month.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: I'm due to die. Suppose it today, suppose it tomorrow. So you've come in vain, child.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: They won't allow the doctor in—they're murdering me.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Won't you protest? You are a Grand Duke.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Exactly why. I am powerless to resist Ursus. I have since accepted that.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: How is the weather today? I can feel the sunshine, turning warm now.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Not a cloud in sight, Grand Duke.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah... not a cloud in sight. It's been long. Since the last day like this.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Do you feel despair?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Despair...? Despair is but a passer-by of the start. Our endless lives are always suffused with an emotion. It neither induces despair, nor makes your life bottomless joy.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: We are all living in compromise. Some would call it apathy, and some would say, I am simply reaping what I sowed.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Yes. The weather is warming. That gust of wind just now failed to chill me to the bone.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Who sent you, young lady?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: You've already surmised.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And you are not astonished? Say, I thought a sum failure like myself would have been scapegoated in the limelight, forever looked down on by the young.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: I have never looked down on a single person, let alone you, a Grand Duke of Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course you wouldn't tell me honestly... as to be expected. Let me take a guess...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: The Minister of Finance? No, no-no-no... he and my affairs are entirely unrelated. He does not possess this kind of finesse to interfere in others' stations. If it were his idea... I would rather it his idea.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Well, then, was it some woodworm in the Army? Those old, timid, cowardly bastards... not them, not them either, they have simpler ways...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Let me guess, young one, who sent you here...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Are you still there, young one?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Was it His Majesty's idea? His Majesty wants an... arrogant fool like me to pay the price for his own stupid actions?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Oh, I knew that evening was not but a nightmare...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Do you know how it feels to be blind in both eyes? From that dark view I had long been used to, I felt some more warped thing, squirming... the otherly sensation of fear.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: You mean the fear that cannot even be concealed by blindness.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That was the Royal Guard's will, young one. That evening, the Emperor's Blade was only a step away from my throat.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: What? A paring knife? Let me do it.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: The journey will be very tight, but if I don't even have the time to peel an apple for my friend, I can't help but be disillusioned.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.text: How could I let the Minister of Finance do some odd chore like this.

attributes.content: Are you mocking me?
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.text: Perhaps a Minister of Finance should not hold a knife. You should focus on something else.

attributes.content: Don't joke with me, old friend. I'm just peeling an apple. Don't tell me you're about to rave superstitious at me?
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Look, how fresh the fruits here at the retreat are. These'll be good for your health, too.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.text: No, Witte, my friend, give the knife to me. Perhaps I'm due for some exercise, so as not to rust myself away.

attributes.content: You're too feeble. You might cut your own hand open.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.text: Surely, you don't feel a staff officer of the Army of Ursus would lack the strength for even a paring knife?

attributes.content: No, I don't think that.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Ah, fine, old friend, have the knife. Be very careful.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: What are you—Doctor!—What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Why treat yourself like this—Cutting your own finger—Doctor!
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.text: Gasp—Witte! Don't worry, this doesn't hurt like you imagine... my year-round pains have already accustomed me... don't hurry off, now, listen to me first.
Look, Witte, on my right hand, the racket of artillery gunfire shook off some fingers... Kazimierz people lopped my right thumb off, and a Higashi assassin made off with half my pointer.
I've always felt my right hand was undersold, Witte, taken simply for a knife hand, it fell to such treatment.
Now, I have cut off my left-hand pointer. Here, both my hands are no longer sound. Very fair.

attributes.content: What is all this for...!
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.text: Tell me, Witte, from Ursus's wars, these glorious scars I once regarded as an honor all my life, do they truly have any glory to speak of?

No, I don't need you to answer me. It's a trifling thing, but see, my fresh wound, blood dripping, this was done by my own will. It awakens me from my grave affliction, allows me to converse with you again.
Witte, you will return to Deity Grypherburg, correct? You will sooner or later return, back to that grand city.
Take a piece of my form, my constitution with you. My body was scattered about in campaigns, subjected to ruin, but only this piece of flesh was separated by my own will.
I have no children, but this pointer finger—jeer at my foolishness, go on—this pointer finger is the only flesh I have birthed.
Take it to Deity Grypherburg, bury it in your garden, or in a flower pot by the street. Let me live in the earth of Deity Grypherburg.
Oh, let my flesh become one with Ursus... take me to Deity Grypherburg, to the heart of what all our generations have defended, to the heart of Ursus!
—Witte!

attributes.content: What's with all the people running around today... ugh, a flock of idiots who don't know the rules.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Stay here and don't move. I'm taking a look.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Alright, sir.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: (I don't know what Kal'tsit's doing in there...)
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: (Ugh. We don't have much time.)
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Hey, you, back to Room 116.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: What? But my helper is still in—
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: A servant is enough either way, here. No need for a doctor.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: This is the Minister of Finance's request. If you upset a minister, we'll never survive it.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Now leave! You want to see the gallows?!
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Yes, yes, sorry, I'm going now, right now...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: (Kal'tsit...! Quick!)
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Young one, come, sit here. What's your name?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That is neither a nom de guerre, nor a nom de plume, correct?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: I can hear... from the manner in which you introduce yourself, I can hear, you love this name, don't you, Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Hard to say.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We don't have long, Grand Duke. In a short moment, your guards will come charging in here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh... it seems I must make space for the assassin after my own life...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Hmm. My communicator should be right by my side...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Here it is.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ha. What a prudent murderer. Just when did you pilfer it?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Please give it to me.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Thank you for your trust, young one. You make such ease of it... no matter who sent you, I trust you will become one vastly capable.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Sir, this is a servant of the retreat... who hails from my homeland. I wish to chat with her further. Do not disturb us, until I give the order.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Trespassers are in violation of military order. Do you understand?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Where is your homeland?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right on the other side of Pine Valley.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Are you so willing to trust me because you have all your means well prepared? Even if they came charging in, you could still escape unscathed, couldn't you?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: I will not answer that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Or you really aren't from the Royal Guard. You are neither twisted nor terrible. Yes, how could the Royal Guard leave their work to others?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: They are Ursus's most selfless monitors. Only those capable of being weighed on the scales, will the Royal Guard look at with value.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Alright. I've lost, young one. I cannot guess at all at your oh-so-mysterious past.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Why have you come?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: My duty lies here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, will I pass away painfully?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: You won't. The drug will slowly erode your nervous system. You'll fall asleep as though entering a coma, and never wake up.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: To an old soul plagued by illness, this may even be considered a favor.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: I thank you.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: I've been meaning to ask, are you a doctor? A scientist?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Do you have a shining pair of eyes? Do the odors of medicine cling to your fingers?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Do—
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: —Hold on, hold on. Did you come... come for that affair in Chernobog?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Kal'tsit... Kal'tsit... the director who died in the inferno that day, was that the name?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: If you truly remember every sacrifice, then perhaps I'm unable to escape the all-seeing eye of Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah... it's you, you're the very Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: How strange... that you hid from the Secret Police. What's more, and stole into this place without even changing your name...?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: How did you do it?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: There are always ways, Grand Duke.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Some want me dead, and some do not. I thought you a scientist, one that should not be so... easily fooled.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Ah... or could it be, some have paid you off? Some have exploited your vengeful rage, so as to have me killed?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: I believe I have no comment, Your Grace.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It is time. I will inject the drug.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah, you have signed my death warrant. Very good. This may be leagues simpler than such torture...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: It's done, Your Grace.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How much time do I have left?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Fifteen minutes, Your Grace.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Tell me, young one, is the scenery before me very beautiful?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: All the land is budding, and the sunshine will feed it, filling it with hope.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Is it beautiful?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: It's a magnificent scene, but this magnificence is trivially ordinary to Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Heh. Young ones always are good with words... How many of our people... could ever see this view?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: That's right... flowers, my flowers. I scattered seeds... have they sprouted? Have they begun to bud? These eyes of mine, so ruined, could not even persevere long enough to see them bloom...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: So far, at least... you're out of luck.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It seems the Empire's winter was detrimental to the growth of these ornamental plants.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah... they cannot bloom here?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: In this boundless winter, what did you plant?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When I was young... I took part in a war against Kazimierz. Have you fought a war before, Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: War is wild and chaotic. Ten-some minutes past the first sound of gunfire, formation and battlefield had lost all meaning.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: A few knights wounded my leg, and bludgeoned my head. I tossed my helmet aside, and as if for my life, I crawled... crawled until I reached a flower field.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: In there I blacked out, and was later saved by reinforcements. In my giddy daze, I remembered what those flowers were like.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: ...Pine lilies.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes... after the war, I asked someone to bring back some seeds from the frontier. I hated their Kazimierz scientific name, and so called them by a completely new one.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: I like those flowers. My city regarded them as a symbol of the city itself. Ursus's soil... is more suited to raising them than Kazimierz's.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: My wife... cared for them, cared for them so well.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: But they... never broke through the soil.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Spring didn't come soon enough, Your Grace.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah... the earth of my beloved Ursus. Know it can nurture hopes of all kind.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: It is irrigated, too, by the bodies of the poor and the Infected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't deny it has likely committed all manner of atrocity. Yet even so, the earth forgives all... ah, I feel tired...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: That doesn't seem a very convincing excuse.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Excuse? No, young one... I never thought I'd earn any pardon, and I never wanted for one...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Only—Only in life's final moments, do I think... I was able to realize... the meaning... it was all...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Pine lilies...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: I want... to see her again...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Leave, now, young one.
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: I feel... how warm, the sunlight, as if I... can, once... again, see...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Hahh...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Perhaps you never had the means to pardon yourself in your final moments.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Ursine) May yet Ursus forget you, Grand Duke.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Ursine) ...Ursus... my...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: ...motherland...
attributes.name: Grand Duke Vanya

attributes.content: Sir, the Grand Duke has fallen asleep.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You don't need to tell me. We've had orders. We can only enter after half an hour.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Hah. Same home as the Grand Duke, hmph?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: I've heard why you young women are all squeezing to work in this retreat. It's just to seek patronage from important nobles, isn't it?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Are you satisfied now? What are you staring off for? Don't tell me you want me to shine your shoes?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: No, how could I dare... I'm very sorry! Sir, don't be angry, I'll be going right now...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Gah, lowlife...
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Paring knives will very easily rust, and lead to infection. We'll pay close attention to his condition, rest assured.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Good, thank you.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: It seems the blood rushing to my friend's head has cost me a considerable amount of time...
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: After he leaves the infirmary, please tell him, he has set alight the blaze in our hearts, and please have him trust. Trust his friend Islam Witte.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: But for now, I must be on my way with my Messenger.
attributes.name: Witte

attributes.content: Safe travels.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: (Kal'tsit—!)
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: (We leave immediately.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (The Minister of Finance will have those bureaucrats' subordinates jumping at shadows. That's our best cover.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Is... is he dead?)
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: (The time to effect was shorter than I thought. He couldn't hold himself together much longer in the first place.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (There are countless people who'll want to exploit his death. Maybe them fighting on all fronts will create an opening for us.)
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: (Let's go.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit—
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: For me... For us, you've put an end to it all, with your own hands.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: It isn't over yet.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No matter in what form it takes... perhaps sooner or later, we'll confront this empire once again.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
